alert.note: Alert for Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 11:33AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN CENTRE AND SOUTHERN CENTRE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1132 AM EST, a band of snow showers was along a line extending from near Bellefonte to near Clearfield and moving southeast at 45 MPH. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 56 to 76. This includes the following highways... Route 220 from near Bald Eagle to State College. Alternate Route 220 near near Port Matilda. Route 322 from Philipsburg to State College. State Road 350 from Philipsburg to near Bald Eagle. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
